attributes.action: Get OCR to write better questions for Computer Science.
attributes.background: Currently the exam board OCR writes terrible ambiguous questions for their Computer Science exam papers, which lead to a fog of uncertainty and unnecessary marks lost. They also mark extremely pedantically, forcing pupils to memorise set answers to questions.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
